Simple Database

Home About Contact
+

What is this project?

This is a simple database made using JS. It provides the opportunity to register and log in to your account, and gain access to the admin panel, provided that you are logged into the admin account.
The default administrator login and password are “admin”, “admin”.

How to deploy website on your local machine?
1. Install Parcel:
npm install --save-dev parcel
2. Then build project:
npm run build
3. Start the local server:
npm run serve
